author: danadak
title: Collab Tools for Community DAOs
description: Communities lack tools, helpful knowledge, and the  effective collaborative practices necessary to create & operate Community DAOs.
solution: A collaborative process to share knowledge & practice and a platform to catalyze intentions & actions for effective Community DAO's.
experience: Dan Kimball: tech entrepreneur with 40 years developing tech products & companies; co-founder of an active community governed DAO project
